content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: white_bed
inventory=[{"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 49, "index": 18}, {"type": "cooked_rabbit", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "chorus_fruit", "quantity": 46, "index": 35}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 36}]

thought: To craft a white bed, I need to first craft warped planks. This can be done by placing 1 stripped warped stem in the crafting table. I currently have 49 stripped warped stems stored at slot 18. Therefore, I will move 1 stripped warped stem to slot 1 of the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: white_bed
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 49, "index": 18}, {"type": "cooked_rabbit", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "chorus_fruit", "quantity": 46, "index": 35}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 36}]
thought: Now I need to place the 4 jungle planks in the crafting table to make a white bed. I will move all 4 planks from slot 0 to slot 11.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: white_bed
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 49, "index": 18}, {"type": "cooked_rabbit", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "chorus_fruit", "quantity": 46, "index": 35}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 36}]

thought: To craft a white bed, I need to place 3 white_wools on the top row of the crafting grid, and 3 planks on the bottom row. Since I have 3 white_wools in slot 36, I will move one of them to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: white_bed
inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 49, "index": 18}, {"type": "cooked_rabbit", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "chorus_fruit", "quantity": 46, "index": 35}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 2, "index": 36}]
thought: I still need to place two more white_wools on the top row of the crafting grid, so I will move another wool to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: white_bed
inventory=[{"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 49, "index": 18}, {"type": "cooked_rabbit", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "chorus_fruit", "quantity": 46, "index": 35}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}]
thought: I still need to place two more white_wools on the top row of the crafting grid, so I will move another wool to slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: white_bed
inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 49, "index": 18}, {"type": "cooked_rabbit", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "chorus_fruit", "quantity": 46, "index": 35}]
thought: Now that I have placed the three white_wools in the top row of the crafting grid, I need to place three planks in the bottom row. I will use the birch_plank in slot 14.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: white_bed
inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 49, "index": 18}, {"type": "cooked_rabbit", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "chorus_fruit", "quantity": 46, "index": 35}]
thought: I will use the jungle_plank in slot 11 to place another plank in the bottom row of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 5 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 49, "index": 18}, {"type": "cooked_rabbit", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "chorus_fruit", "quantity": 46, "index": 35}]
thought: I will use the jungle_plank in slot 11 to place another plank in the bottom row of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 6 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: white_bed
inventory=[{"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 49, "index": 18}, {"type": "cooked_rabbit", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "chorus_fruit", "quantity": 46, "index": 35}]
thought: Now that I have placed the three planks in the bottom row of the crafting grid, I can craft the white_bed and move it to an empty slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
